about.title: About Me
about.description: Software developer passionate about creating solutions that make a difference. I specialize in web development and enjoy learning new technologies.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Feel free to reach out if you have any questions, project ideas, or just want to connect. I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and collaborations.

intro.typewriterText: Abel Haro Armero, Computer Engineering student at the Polytechnic University of Valencia.
